q: Says Egypt's Hosni Mubarak Knows He's On the Way Out Defense Donald Rumsfeld said Egyptian President Bush Hosni Mubarak "is behaving in a way that he understands that he will eventually depart" and that the crisis in Egypt is probably best handled through private diplomacy. Donald Rumsfeld , who has known Hosni Mubarak since 1975, told ABC's Good Morning America that the United States' interest in Egypt should be focused on "having that country evolve toward freer economic systems." In his own statement, Mr Andy Coulson said coverage of events connected to his former job made it difficult for him to "give the 110 per cent needed". He said: Nothing is more important than the Government's task of getting this country back on its feet. "Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 per cent needed in this role. result: This red state wants more gun control-- indeed, they favor it more than national surveys have shown since the shooting of Sen. Bernie Sanders Gabrielle Giffords ( D) in the Tucson area. The poll asked: In general do you think Arizona should have stricter laws concerning who can buy guns or not? The answer was Yes 55%, No 38%. In July she filed a six-page court brief- aptly titled Motion to Dismiss: The Constitutionality of "Douche Bag." Maytin contended that the disorderly conduct charge should have been dropped because Fordham was protected by free speech. , saying "I applaud much of the important work that is done at Title X clinics across the country."* FACT: Rep. Mike Pence , on the House floor in January 2011, said, This legislation does not cut one penny from Title X family planning funding. I applaud much of the important work that is done at Title X clinics across this country- breast cancer screening, HIV protection, education, counseling, pregnancy diagnosis. This legislation simply prevents family planning funding from aiding organizations that profit from the abortion industry.[ http://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/pkg/CREC-2011-01-07/pdf/CREC-2011-01-07-pt1-PgH125-3.pdf#page=1]* FACT: Politico reports, "Republicans are looking to wipe out funding for Title X, a 40-year-old family planning program....
